v1.2
-Added menu for resizing the game. Default Resolution: 1024*576
-Fixed sound bug. Clickteam is weird about sounds tho, so the buttons don't always sound off, nor do destroyed cities play their sound. It's annoying and weird. 
-Added raids! Now Even if you sit at one city, it can get raided for all its resources
